reviews.review: Anlatmaya gerek yok görüyorsunuz
Игра не на шутку затягивает

Очевидно лучшая игра эвер, графика невероятно приятная, погружаешься в процесс и не замечаешь, как уже прошёл игру полностью, а за окном уже 4 часа утра. Отдельная выделю юмористическую составляющую: тупо вышка. 
Вы еще не играли в эту игру? Тогда вы - лох!
без слов
Есть мультиплеер, а также возможность создавать свои тестовые камеры или брать из мастерской и играть в них

Best puzzle game out there. Can be tricky at times but overall is quite easy. If you struggle in a level/checkpoint, i highly recommend u save the game before attempting something stupid or trying out jumping from different heights.

How can you not have fun with Portal 2. From story telling. To the satire. It is just a great game.

I forgot to review this one after completing the single player story.
Nice sequel and nice conclusion between MC and GLaDOS.
Have to drop the game when a bit closer before the betrayal, because I was a bit retarded and maybe drunk 'cause cannot see the obvious platform to teleport to.
And then just recently retry that part and then went "Oh my, it's not even that hard", then proceed to finish it till the end.
The betrayal is kinda heartbreaking, the escape is so intense, the puzzle is so good, the portals... it's always gonna make me puke. LOL.

BUY THIS GAME, IF YOU HAVEN'T YET!!!
PLAY THIS GAME, IF YOU HAVEN'T YET!!!
One of the best puzzle games with nice story, and then intense, and motion sick maker... perhaps. Haha.

RECOMMENDED!!!

Nice, innovative puzzle game with a twist. Has a nice editor where you can design your own test chambers and challenge others, and be challenged by community creations. Decent length, entertaining campaign with plenty of laughs and memorable characters as well as a co-op campaign, to play with your friends. I enjoyed it's balanced challenge. Most people will like this game.

Aşırı kafa yormanız gerek ve kesinlikle bir arkadaşınızla oynayın. Öbür türlü trollerden geçilmeyecek bir oyun. Ürkütücü bölümleri var ama genel olarak çok zevkli ve tauntlar vs. çok tatlı bir hava eklemiş oyuna. 
Zeki arkadaşlarınızla girin çünkü oyunun asıl amacı internetten bakmadan bitirebilmek ve şifreleri birlikte çözmek. Takım işi ve ciddiyet çok önemli.

This is an AWESOME game. From the details in the design to the wonderful story, Portal 2 is truly a masterpiece. I can split the game into three main elements of awesome: The Story, The Controls, and the Level. The story is fascinating, while easy to follow. The Controls are simple and compliment the game itself well. The levels and maps throughout the game are difficult, but possible, and are all well-built. Overall, this is a great game for someone who loves single player, story-based games with structure. I was able to borrow it from a friend to play, and am now buying it myself to play it again even though I already played it through.

This was an okay game, but nothing more than that. The puzzles were okay. There were a few that were really a bit challenging, but most were rather easy. In the beginning I thought this would be a very humorous game, but honestly I could only smile a few times at most. Graphically it all looked very bland and why, for the love of god, didn't they give me a body in first person view? Also these people/things kept babbling on and on about stuff that I often had a hard time even understanding and when I did it really wasn't interesting. Was there supposed to be a story here? If so, then I missed it entirely.

Ultimately this just became a repetitive uninspiring slog because there's not that much variety in the puzzles and the environments were bland.
I remember having more fun with the first portal game; it definitely was more humorous. But this one overall? Meh... I can't really recommend it unless maybe in a deep sale.

One of my favorite series of all time. If you're wondering if you should buy it. I say yes absolutely but you have to play the first game to understand what the hell is going on in the second game. 10/10 Valve really kicked it out of the park with this one. The story line is amazing and so are the graphics. The tests are great and require great problem solving which is a lot of fun. I believe that anything by Valve is golden so if looking for a game to play. You can't go wrong with Valve.
